Description.Text: The Ferman Sultan is a 3-star superior hotel offering a city centre location, modern spacious rooms and high quality facilities. The traditional Ottoman style hotel is within a short walking distance of attraction such as Topkapi Palace, the Spice Bazaar and Grand Bazaar. Guests can also take part in Turkish tradition at the Suleymaniye Bath or travel the short driving distance down to the coast. Guests can make use of the complimentary fitness room and sauna or indulge in one of the massage treatments on offer in the comfort of their own rooms. Choices include Indian head massage and reflexology. Overlooking the Princess islands and the Marmara sea is the Terrace restaurant which serves Turkish and international cuisine and which sets out tables on its outdoor terrace during the summer. Standard rooms are decorated in Ottoman style with charming ceiling gold leaf design. Amenities include LCD TV, air conditioning, telephone, mini bar and a safe. Bathrooms contain a shower or bath and include a hairdryer. Complimentary Wi-fi is available in rooms and communal areas of the hotel.
